subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori, the 126th-ranked player in the world, pulled off the men’s upset of the first week when he defeated the No. 4 seed, David Ferrer of Spain.
snippet: Kei Nishikori, the 126th-ranked player in the world, pulled off the men’s upset of the first week when he defeated the No. 4 seed, David Ferrer of Spain.
